item.title: Phd Dissertation Defense, Cheer up! 2022
item.description: I successfully defended my Ph.D. dissertation entitled “Robotic planning and control for door-opening manipulation on electric power cabinets”. Cheer up! Many thanks to my supervisor, Prof. Gao Bingtuan, and all the committee members!

item.title: Stay strong, China! 2020
item.description: During my leisure time, I joined a running club called Running Panda, Paris’s largest Chinese running club in France. Our club spontaneously organized a Marathon 34 km tour de Paris to cheer up for Chinese Fighting COVID-19!

item.title: Welcome Day of the Doctoral School of Institut Polytechnique de Paris, France, 2019
item.description: The Institut Polytechnique de Paris (QS Rank: 49 in 2022) is a public higher education and research institution comprising five prestigious French engineering Schools in 2019: École Polytechnique, ENSTA Paris, ENSAE Paris, Télécom Paris and Télécom SudParis. Under the aegis of the Institute, they bring together two centuries of expertise to pursue two major goals: to develop world-class training programs and cutting edge research.

item.title: IEEE-CYBER 2019, Suzhou, China
item.description: I presented an oral at the 9th IEEE International Conference on CYBER Technology in Automation, Control, and Intelligent Systems (IEEE-CYBER 2019) and got the finalist of best student paper reward. Great conference!

item.title: World Robot Conference 2017, Beijing, China
item.description: I participated in the (World Robot Conference 2017) with Prof. Bingtuan Gao. Great conference WCR 2017!
